item.title: [pi] wielding claws/staffoflight [pi]
item.dc:creator: @KrypitcRc KrypitcRc
item.description:
@KrypitcRc wrote:

In your ItemAssistant.java search for

switch (wearID) {

Under that put

case ITEM_ID: targetSlot = 5; break;

For your 2nd question, go to ObjectManager.java and search for alter of guthix id

Something like this probably

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(OBJECT_ID, COORD-X, COORD-Y, 1, 10);

(sorry if I mixed up the X and Y)

And MTP V2 is marcbobs PI base not delta

Read full topic

@4_2_0 wrote:

Well as for the weilding, go to your item.java and put the id numbers in the appropriate place. Example - Strength Ammy = ****, so put that number with the rest of the Amulets.

I don’t understand your second question.

item.title: [pi] wielding claws/staffoflight [pi]
item.dc:creator: @s_w_3_3_t1 s w 3 3 t1
item.description:
@s_w_3_3_t1 wrote:

hey guy’s i need help with item’s which have been added e.g. d claws and staff of light, when you wield them they go to your ‘head’

& i which to take away my lunar altar and change it to you speak to an npc to change it. pls help iv looked and can’t find them. this is the id for the altar, objectid: 17010; objectx: 3103; objecty: 3508;

thankyou.
